page.title: 14 CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: We play lots of different games at school including skipping, Off Ground Touch, It and Stick in the Mud. Here are two games we play on the playing field and at school. London is a game we play on the village playing field. Someone isÂ£up' and he or she has to close their eyes and spell out London. If you are on the monkey bars you have to let something swing so that the person who isÂ£up' can touch you and guess who you are with his eyes closed. He can tickle you to make you laugh if he wants. If he guesses who you are, you are Â£up' instead. Forty-forty is one of the games we play in the playground. There is a post and one person stands near the post and closes his eyes. Other people go off and hide. When the person by the post
